title: With a Bullet
description: For Jeremy Archer, it all starts with a simple phone call from halfway around the world.For Simon Drake, it all started three years ago...Now a madman from Simon's past is on the loose, claiming his revenge on Simon and his team, one member at a time... and no one who stands in his way is safe.No one.Not even Jeremy Archer.The third novel in the Shadow of the Templar series, newly revised and updated for the trade paperback edition!
author: M. Chandler
